sentences.en: A flower is made up of four parts: the sepal, petal, stamen and pistil.
sentences.cn: 一朵花由四部分组成: 花萼, 花瓣, 雄蕊和雌蕊.

sentences.en: A flower is made up of four parts:the sepal, petal, stamen and pistil.
sentences.cn: 一朵花由四部分组成：花萼，花瓣，雄蕊和雌蕊。

sentences.en: Botany The hood - shaped sepal or corolla of some flowers.
sentences.cn: 盔状花冠(或花萼):某些花朵盔状的花萼或花冠.

sentences.en: Botany The hood-shaped sepal or corolla of some flowers.
sentences.cn: 盔状花冠（或花萼）：某些花朵盔状的花萼或花冠。

sentences.en: Entire Describing the margin of a leaf, sepal, or petal that is smooth and undivided.
sentences.cn: 全缘的:用于描述叶 、 萼片或花瓣的边缘光滑、无裂片.

sentences.en: Leave away the sepal and crash the petal parts. Preheat the oven to 175C/350F.
sentences.cn: 将干燥玫瑰花去掉花萼，以手捏碎花瓣部份。烤箱预热至175C/350F。

sentences.en: Sepal One of the structures situated immediately below the petals of a flower.
sentences.cn: 萼片:一朵花中位置紧接在花瓣下方的结构.

sentences.en: The sepal is usually green. It can protect the flower bud.
sentences.cn: 花萼通常是绿色的, 它能保护花芽.

sentences.en: The sequence of correlation with locule number was sepal number, fruit weight and fruIt'shape index.
sentences.cn: 相关分析表明,番茄心室数与萼片数的相关性最大, 其次为单果质量,而与果形指数的相关性最小.

trans.tran_en: one of the small leaves directly under a flower
